text: Guy Stern (born Günther Stern; January 14, 1922 – December 7, 2023) was a German-American U.S. Army soldier and scholar. He was a decorated member of the secret Ritchie Boys World War II military intelligence interrogation team. He later became a scholar of literature. Stern died on December 7, 2023 in Detroit, Michigan at the age of 101.Holocaust-Überlebender Guy Stern mit 101 Jahren gestorben ==Works== *Invisible Ink: A Memoir.
